Flow.description: Flow to send notifications for GTS Relocation Work Order Request.

formulas.name: Notification_Body_For_GTS_Approved
formulas.expression: 'Your requested relocation was approved for Case '+{!$Record.CaseNumber}+'/SN '+{!$Record.SVMXC__Component__r.SVMXC__Serial_Lot_Number__c}+'.'

formulas.name: Notification_Body_For_GTS_Block
formulas.expression: 'Your requested relocation could not be approved for Case '+{!$Record.CaseNumber}+'/SN '+{!$Record.SVMXC__Component__r.SVMXC__Serial_Lot_Number__c}+'. Please check your email for more details.'

formulas.name: Notification_Body_For_GTS_Request_Failed
formulas.expression: 'Your requested relocation could not sync to SAP for Case '+{!$Record.CaseNumber}+'/SN '+{!$Record.SVMXC__Component__r.SVMXC__Serial_Lot_Number__c}+'. Please check your email for more details.'

textTemplates.name: Email_Template_For_GTS_Approved_Internal_User
textTemplates.text: Your requested relocation was approved for Case {!$Record.CaseNumber}/SN {!$Record.SVMXC__Component__r.SVMXC__Serial_Lot_Number__c}:{!Direct_User_Url}

textTemplates.name: Email_Template_For_GTS_Approved_Partner_User
textTemplates.text: Your requested relocation was approved for Case {!$Record.CaseNumber}/SN {!$Record.SVMXC__Component__r.SVMXC__Serial_Lot_Number__c}:{!Channel_Partner_Portal_Url}

textTemplates.name: Email_Template_For_GTS_Error_Internal_User
textTemplates.text:
Your requested relocation could not be approved for Case {!$Record.CaseNumber}/SN {!$Record.SVMXC__Component__r.SVMXC__Serial_Lot_Number__c}:{!Direct_User_Url}

{!$Record.Relocation_Integration_Message__c}

textTemplates.name: Email_Template_For_GTS_Error_Partner_User
textTemplates.text:
Your requested relocation could not be approved for Case {!$Record.CaseNumber}/SN {!$Record.SVMXC__Component__r.SVMXC__Serial_Lot_Number__c}:{!Channel_Partner_Portal_Url}

{!$Record.Relocation_Integration_Message__c}

textTemplates.name: Email_Template_For_GTS_Request_Failed_Internal_User
textTemplates.text:
Your requested relocation could not sync to SAP for Case {!$Record.CaseNumber}/SN {!$Record.SVMXC__Component__r.SVMXC__Serial_Lot_Number__c}:{!Direct_User_Url}

 

{!$Record.Relocation_Integration_Message__c}

textTemplates.name: Email_Template_For_GTS_Request_Failed_Partner_User
textTemplates.text:
Your requested relocation could not sync to SAP for Case {!$Record.CaseNumber}/SN {!$Record.SVMXC__Component__r.SVMXC__Serial_Lot_Number__c}:{!Channel_Partner_Portal_Url}
